explanation: [0-0] The video begins on a sandy beach on a sunny day. Two young girls wearing similar plaid skirts are standing together. The girl on the left has blonde highlights in her hair, while the girl on the right has blonde hair. The girl on the right is eating a pink cotton candy, and the girl on the left is looking at the cotton candy in the girl's hand with her mouth open.

[0-7] Then a young man with white hair walks into the picture from the left. He is wearing a black vest and a silver necklace. He walks to the left side of the girl, then lifts her right hand and makes a gesture. The girl on the left looks a little impatient, and then the girl on the right opens her mouth wide and looks surprised. Finally, the girl on the left also opens her mouth and smiles, and the man smiles too.
